Insert Module¶

This module contains functions to convert pandas DataFrames to SQL insert statements and execute them.

pysqltools.src.queries.insert.generate_insert_query(df: DataFrame, table: str = None, schema: str = None, batch_size: int = 5000) → Generator[Query, None, None][source]¶
pysqltools.src.queries.insert.insert_pandas(df: DataFrame, connection: SQLConnection, table: str, schema: str, batch_size: int)[source]¶
pysqltools.src.queries.insert.join_values(data: list[Any]) → str[source]¶

Create a String for the VALUES () SQL Syntax

pysqltools.src.queries.insert.pandas_to_sql(df: DataFrame) → Generator[str, None, None][source]¶

Generator to get one row insert statement

pysqltools.src.queries.insert.prepare_value(val: Any) → Any[source]¶

Format value from Python types to SQL Types
